mapper.select: select e.emp_no "emp_no", e.emp_rrn_no "emp_rrn_no", d.dept_name "dept_name", j.job_name "job_name", e.emp_name "emp_name" from (emp_tb e inner join dept_tb d on e.dept_cd = d.dept_cd inner join job_tb j on e.job_cd = j.job_cd) where d.dept_cd = (select dept_cd from emp_tb where emp_no=#{empNo})
mapper.update: update sched_tb set sche_cate = #{scheCate}, emp_no = ${empNo}, emp_name = #{empName}, dept_name = #{deptName}, job_name = #{jobName}, sche_name = #{scheName}, sche_start = to_date(#{scheStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), sche_end = to_date(#{scheEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), sche_color = #{scheColor}, sche_ex = #{scheEx} where sche_code = ${scheCode}

update sched_tb set sche_start = to_date((select #{resizeStart} || substr(to_char(sche_start),10) from sched_tb where sche_code = ${scheCode}), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), sche_end = to_date((select #{resizeEnd} || substr(to_char(sche_end), 10) from sched_tb where sche_code = ${scheCode}), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') where sche_code = ${scheCode}
